charinfo.name: ET Sandaime Raikage (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Sandaime Raikage (S) is not pleased to be back among the living and forced to do battle. He does however have faith that the new generation of shinobi can defeat him and his peers.

abilities.name: Four Finger Nukite
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Sandaime Raikage (S) uses Four Finger Nukite on one enemy dealing 25 piercing damage*. Edo Tensei Sandaime Raikage (S) gains 25% damage reduction permanently when this skill is used. This skill becomes Three Finger Nukite permanently when used.

abilities.name: Lightning Release Shockwave
abilities.description: Using Lightning Release Shockwave Edo Tensei Sandaime Raikage (S) targets one enemy dealing 25 damage. One random enemy will be dealt 25 damage that ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: One Finger Nukite Spear
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Sandaime Raikage (S) uses One Finger Nukite Spear on one enemy dealing 50 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Immense Speed
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Sandaime Raikage (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
